message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Considering its value to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $800000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an asset worth $1000000 at a discounted rate. I look forward to your response.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. While I understand your perspective, I must respectfully decline the counteroffer. Our product, while valuable to you at $600000, retains a higher intrinsic value to us. To better align our interests, I propose a revised price of $700000. This still offers a significant discount to its true value, while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still not convinced that $700000 is the best price for me. I'd like to make a revised offer of $650000. I believe this is a fair price that takes into account the product's value to me, while also being respectful of your company's valuation.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. After careful consideration, I understand your position and am prepared to meet you halfway. Therefore, I propose a final offer of $675000 for the product. This price reflects a significant discount to its true value while still ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go to $675000. I'd like to make one final counteroffer of $660000. I believe this is the highest price I'm willing to pay for the product, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration of your most recent offer, I am prepared to accept a final price of $665000 for the product. I believe this price strikes a balance between reflecting its true value and accommodating your needs. I hope this offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
